enhanced_production_positive_volumes_che.name: enhanced_production_positive_volumes_check
enhanced_production_positive_volumes_che.value:
(allocated_oil_volume IS NULL OR allocated_oil_volume >= 0)
          AND (allocated_gas_volume IS NULL OR allocated_gas_volume >= 0)
          AND (allocated_water_volume IS NULL OR allocated_water_volume >= 0)

enhanced_production_percentage_bounds_ch.name: enhanced_production_percentage_bounds_check
enhanced_production_percentage_bounds_ch.value:
(allocation_confidence_percent IS NULL OR (allocation_confidence_percent >= 0 AND allocation_confidence_percent <= 100))
          AND (data_quality_score IS NULL OR (data_quality_score >= 0 AND data_quality_score <= 100))

formation_tops_depth_positive_check.name: formation_tops_depth_positive_check
formation_tops_depth_positive_check.value: top_depth >= 0 AND (bottom_depth IS NULL OR bottom_depth >= 0)

formation_tops_depth_ordering_check.name: formation_tops_depth_ordering_check
formation_tops_depth_ordering_check.value: bottom_depth IS NULL OR top_depth <= bottom_depth

formation_tops_correlation_range_check.name: formation_tops_correlation_range_check
formation_tops_correlation_range_check.value: correlation_confidence IS NULL OR (correlation_confidence >= 0 AND correlation_confidence <= 100)

geological_data_depth_ordering_check.name: geological_data_depth_ordering_check
geological_data_depth_ordering_check.value:
(top_measured_depth IS NULL OR base_measured_depth IS NULL OR top_measured_depth <= base_measured_depth)
        AND (top_true_vertical_depth IS NULL OR base_true_vertical_depth IS NULL OR top_true_vertical_depth <= base_true_vertical_depth)

geological_data_porosity_range_check.name: geological_data_porosity_range_check
geological_data_porosity_range_check.value: porosity_percent IS NULL OR (porosity_percent >= 0 AND porosity_percent <= 100)

geological_data_saturation_range_check.name: geological_data_saturation_range_check
geological_data_saturation_range_check.value: water_saturation_percent IS NULL OR (water_saturation_percent >= 0 AND water_saturation_percent <= 100)

lease_partners_percentage_range_check.name: lease_partners_percentage_range_check
lease_partners_percentage_range_check.value:
working_interest_percent >= 0 AND working_interest_percent <= 1 AND
          royalty_interest_percent >= 0 AND royalty_interest_percent <= 1 AND
          net_revenue_interest_percent >= 0 AND net_revenue_interest_percent <= 1

lease_partners_date_range_check.name: lease_partners_date_range_check
lease_partners_date_range_check.value: end_date IS NULL OR effective_date <= end_date

leases_royalty_rate_range_check.name: leases_royalty_rate_range_check
leases_royalty_rate_range_check.value: royalty_rate IS NULL OR (royalty_rate >= 0 AND royalty_rate <= 1)

leases_date_range_check.name: leases_date_range_check
leases_date_range_check.value: expiration_date IS NULL OR effective_date IS NULL OR effective_date <= expiration_date

production_allocation_positive_volumes_c.name: production_allocation_positive_volumes_check
production_allocation_positive_volumes_c.value:
(allocated_oil_volume IS NULL OR allocated_oil_volume >= 0)
          AND (allocated_gas_volume IS NULL OR allocated_gas_volume >= 0)
          AND (allocated_water_volume IS NULL OR allocated_water_volume >= 0)

production_allocation_percentage_bounds_.name: production_allocation_percentage_bounds_check
production_allocation_percentage_bounds_.value: allocation_confidence_percent IS NULL OR (allocation_confidence_percent >= 0 AND allocation_confidence_percent <= 100)

production_records_positive_volumes_chec.name: production_records_positive_volumes_check
production_records_positive_volumes_chec.value:
(oil_volume IS NULL OR oil_volume >= 0) AND
          (gas_volume IS NULL OR gas_volume >= 0) AND
          (water_volume IS NULL OR water_volume >= 0)

production_records_positive_prices_check.name: production_records_positive_prices_check
production_records_positive_prices_check.value:
(oil_price IS NULL OR oil_price >= 0) AND
          (gas_price IS NULL OR gas_price >= 0)

reserves_positive_reserves_check.name: reserves_positive_reserves_check
reserves_positive_reserves_check.value:
(net_oil_reserves IS NULL OR net_oil_reserves >= 0)
          AND (net_gas_reserves IS NULL OR net_gas_reserves >= 0)
          AND (net_ngl_reserves IS NULL OR net_ngl_reserves >= 0)
          AND (net_oil_reserves_working_interest IS NULL OR net_oil_reserves_working_interest >= 0)
          AND (net_gas_reserves_working_interest IS NULL OR net_gas_reserves_working_interest >= 0)
          AND (net_ngl_reserves_working_interest IS NULL OR net_ngl_reserves_working_interest >= 0)

reserves_interest_percentage_bounds_chec.name: reserves_interest_percentage_bounds_check
reserves_interest_percentage_bounds_chec.value:
(working_interest_percent IS NULL OR (working_interest_percent >= 0 AND working_interest_percent <= 100))
        AND (net_revenue_interest_percent IS NULL OR (net_revenue_interest_percent >= 0 AND net_revenue_interest_percent <= 100))
        AND (recovery_factor_percent IS NULL OR (recovery_factor_percent >= 0 AND recovery_factor_percent <= 100))

reserves_discount_rate_bounds_check.name: reserves_discount_rate_bounds_check
reserves_discount_rate_bounds_check.value: present_value_discount_rate IS NULL OR (present_value_discount_rate >= 0 AND present_value_discount_rate <= 1)

reserves_validations_review_after_reques.name: reserves_validations_review_after_request_check
reserves_validations_review_after_reques.value: review_date IS NULL OR review_date >= request_date

well_performance_rate_positive_check.name: well_performance_rate_positive_check
well_performance_rate_positive_check.value:
(oil_rate IS NULL OR oil_rate >= 0)
          AND (gas_rate IS NULL OR gas_rate >= 0)
          AND (water_rate IS NULL OR water_rate >= 0)

well_performance_percent_range_check.name: well_performance_percent_range_check
well_performance_percent_range_check.value:
(water_cut_percent IS NULL OR (water_cut_percent >= 0 AND water_cut_percent <= 100))
        AND (bsw_percent IS NULL OR (bsw_percent >= 0 AND bsw_percent <= 100))

well_tests_rate_positive_check.name: well_tests_rate_positive_check
well_tests_rate_positive_check.value:
(oil_rate IS NULL OR oil_rate >= 0)
          AND (gas_rate IS NULL OR gas_rate >= 0)
          AND (water_rate IS NULL OR water_rate >= 0)

well_tests_percent_range_check.name: well_tests_percent_range_check
well_tests_percent_range_check.value: water_cut_percent IS NULL OR (water_cut_percent >= 0 AND water_cut_percent <= 100)
